original_title: El extraordinario brillo de Jesús María
overview: Jesús María, a traditional neighborhood in Lima, told by one of its neighbors, in the first person. The narrative is presented as a letter for the next generations, to the spectators of the future, "be they human or extraterrestrial", and is partially inspired by the pandemic that hit the world in 2020.
title: El extraordinario brillo de Jesús María
